casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffrey Robert PARISI 65A17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 25, 2018 John W. Congleton, Assistant Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Michele A. Goldman, Attorney at Law, for Parisi, Jeffrey Robert.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of June 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of June 2018."
